com.sdicons.json.validator

Interface Validator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    And, Array, Bool, Complex, Content, CustomPredicate, CustomValidator, Decimal, Enumeration, False, Int, JSONValidator, Length, Let, Not, Nr, Null, Object, Or, Predicate, Properties, Range, Ref, Regexp, Simple, Str, Switch, True

    public interface Validator
    A validator inspects a JSONValue. If everything is fine the validator does nothing, and if an error is encounterd the validator throws an exception. Different validators can look at different aspects of JSONValues.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void validate(JSONValue aValue)
      Validate a JSONValue.

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        void validate(JSONValue aValue)
              throws ValidationException
        Validate a JSONValue.
        Parameters:
        aValue - The JSONValue that has to be validated.
        Throws:
        ValidationException - If the validation fails.
